content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your interest in our apartment, Ms. Abbasi. However, due to confidentiality reasons related to my personal approach in negotiations, let us solely focus on the rental price during this discussion. Now, would you care to propose a price for renting this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a cautious individual, I would like to thoroughly assess the local housing market and compare this apartment with similar options available in the city center. Once I have gathered this information, I will be more confident in proposing a fair rental price. Could you perhaps provide me with a few days to conduct this research?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your need for thorough analysis, Ms. Abbasi. However, as a landlord, I must mention that this apartment has unique features and advantages, making it highly sought after. With that said, feel free to take your time in gathering the necessary information. Please do remember that a timely decision would be appreciated as well, as I have other potential tenants interested.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I acknowledge your situation as a landlord with other prospects. Rest assured, I will prioritize this matter and strive to make a well-informed decision within a reasonable timeframe. I will keep in mind the potential demand for the apartment while evaluating the local market trends and comparable listings. Once I have all these factors considered, I will be confident in proposing a price that aligns with the apartment's value and my financial expectations. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Very well, Ms. Abbasi. I appreciate your consideration and professional approach to this matter. Do keep me updated on your progress, and when you're ready to discuss the rental price, I'll be more than happy to hear your proposal. TERMINATE.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
